channel.title: New Half Life Lets Play
channel.description: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ii7OjgLpEj8[/url] Go here for my first installment in my new half life series lets play :slight_smile: i already have quite a few more episodes up so check em out to! Also sub for future ones as well and be sure to give thought to my other lets play series and vote for my next one!

item.title: New Half Life Lets Play
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
The problem I have with these is that there’s too many of them. Shortly after release most of the threads being created were Let’s Plays, most with annoying commentary. Or half the time they won’t be playing the actual game, just dicking around putting trashbins on scientists heads to make it more “entertaining” for their viewers.

Read full topic

item.title: New Half Life Lets Play
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Sometimes I like to watch other people with a different perspective play a game and talk about it, same reason I like watching my friends playing some games.

They definitely aren’t a large thing for me, there’s like only a handful of people I would actually bother watching play through a game on youtube.

Read full topic

item.title: New Half Life Lets Play
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
I still don’t see the point of "Let’s Play"s. You could just play the game yourself instead of watching someone else play it.

I guess if your computer can’t handle it, or if you want to have a preview, but in the latter case a short video would be more than sufficient.

Ah well…

Read full topic

item.title: New Half Life Lets Play
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
You don’t need to spam your Let’s Plays all over the forums, one thread is enough.

Read full topic
